version_description:
- Introduce the first World
- Introducing the first set of towers
- 20 playable stages
- 2 difficulties
- 4 powerful heroes
- Pre-registration gift
- Event for the beginers

- Add new Spells: Star Guardian and Blizzard
- Add tutorial flow when unlock Spell and Rune
- Add Spell package and Spell Flash Sale pack
- Add feature to return resources when dismantling Rune
- Optimize and rebalance the game
